concept.title: Configuring licensed usage and accepting the license for
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the licensed usage and accept the license for by using a single REST Administration API.

conbody.p: The server will start in maintenance mode until the license is accepted. You can view the current licensed usage by using the Web UI or by using a REST Administration API.

The licensed usage types are: Developers For use in a development and test environment.
Non-Production For use in a development and test environment.
Production For use in a production environment.
IdleStandby For use in a high availability environment.
If you change the licensed usage of , you must accept the license.
